q: BBC as an editor and executive. Now, he is replacing former News of the World editor Andy Coulson as David Cameron 's top media advisor. Announcing Mr Oliver's appointment, Mr David Cameron said: Craig has formidable experience as a broadcast journalist. He will do an excellent job in explaining and communicating the government's programme. Mr Oliver said:" I'm delighted and privileged to be joining David Cameron and his team at such an exciting and challenging time. Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better." Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added:" For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune."

My goal is to run Google at the pace and with the soul and passion of a startup, Page said in a Thursday interview."
